sentences.en: A Disc Jockey ( DJ ) is hired to play all kinds of music.
sentences.cn: 他们会雇一名DJ ( 播音员 ) 来播放各种各样的音乐.

sentences.en: After dancing merengue, the DJ might play slow music.
sentences.cn: 在大家过足瑞格舞瘾之后, DJ通常 会放梅伦格舞曲.

sentences.en: All the while , a DJ keeps the passengers entertained.
sentences.cn: 行程中始终有一位DJ,保证乘客们旅途愉快.

sentences.en: DJ equipment, DJ jewelry retail agents of the registered companies.
sentences.cn: DJ设备, DJ饰品零售代理的注册公司.

sentences.en: DJ is only a pup, but he clearly shows the classical markings.
sentences.cn: 虽然DJ还只是一只幼犬, 但它清楚地显示出了边境牧羊犬的典型斑纹.

sentences.en: DJ is only pup, but he clearly shows the classical markings.
sentences.cn: 固然DJ还只是一只犬, 但它大白地显露出了边境牧羊犬的典型斑纹.

sentences.en: DJ STAND for coffins with built - in shelf. Folds down for easy transport.
sentences.cn: 放DJ系列箱,内 置 托架, 可折叠起来方便运输.

sentences.en: DJ's NBA Mid - season Awards: Coach of the Year so far?
sentences.cn: DJ的NBA赛季半程荣誉: 目前的年度教练?

sentences.en: Has being a DJ always been your dream job?
sentences.cn: 当DJ一直都是你梦想中的工作 吗 ?

sentences.en: I kept praying that the DJ would speed the music up.
sentences.cn: 我不停地祈望唱片播放师能加快音乐的节奏。

sentences.en: The DJ was mixing all sorts of different music in one song.
sentences.cn: 这个DJ把各种不同的音乐混在同一首歌里.

sentences.en: This is your resident DJ signing off for another week with our signature tune.
sentences.cn: 这是本台流行音乐唱片节目主持人,现在播放信号曲来结束我们为您安排的这一星期的节目.

sentences.en: Use a DJ instead of a band.
sentences.cn: 不要请乐队,请一位DJ就可以了.

sentences.en: When I started as a DJ.
sentences.cn: 从我开始做DJ的 时候,它就是最初的地下音乐.

sentences.en: When should a DJ start looking for a manager?
sentences.cn: 一名DJ在什么时候才能够寻求“管家”?

trans.tran_cn: disc jockey （广播电台）流行音乐播音员，流行音乐节目主持人

trans.tran_en: someone who plays records on a radio show or in a club where you can dance
